thread.title: How to harvest rainwater in New Mexico | Local News | abqjournal.com
thread.title_full: How to harvest rainwater in New Mexico | Local News | abqjournal.com

author: Elizabeth Tucker / Journal Digital Producer
title: How to harvest rainwater in New Mexico | Local News | abqjournal.com
text:
The last several days have provided much needed rain for the residents of Albuquerque .
If you noticed a lot of rain collecting in your yard and thought it could be put to better use, consider harvesting the rainwater.
